item.description:
Since we have had requests for more MEET UP Sunday
Coffee and a Movie, then we will schedule another one
For Valentine?s Day Weekend.

Barnes & Noble Booksellers
1375 Boston Post Road.
Milford, Conn. 06460

http://storelocator.b...

storelocator.barnesandnoble.com/storedetail.do?store=2240

We will meet by the Travel Books next to the Starbucks Lounge.

Closer to that date, we will decide on what Movie that
We will go see at the Show Case next door to
B & N at the Ct. Post Mall.


In early January, at the North Haven Barnes and Noble the group
Had an hour and a half discussion around the New Age
& Religion Books.

The group has asked that the next Coffee and a Movie
Day go to the Milford Barnes and Noble.
(I voted for the Milford Borders but was over voted.
Borders have better tables and seating areas.)

I went to Milford B & N earlier on Monday (1/14).
There were a couple of tables that fit four. Four lounge chairs. A couple of dozen
Tables for two. It will be harder to get tables in Milford than
It was in North Haven.

We waited around in North Haven B & N for around 20 minutes for tables.

Do not plan on getting together around tables at the Milford B & N.
We will be better off buying a coffee and
Hanging out in corner of B & N before the Movie.
After the movie, I am going to the Milford Borders
For books, magazines and Seattles Best Coffee.
The rest of the group can go back to Milford
B & N if they want.

More information as we get closer to the date.
We will send e-mail on the selection of movies around on that date.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the Travel Books next to the Starbucks Lounge.
item.why: Those who want to drink coffee around books and go to the movie.
item.name: Valentines Day Weekend Coffee and a Movie
